Package Services

Class MapService

java.lang.Object
Services.MapService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MapService extends Object implements Serializable
The MapService class load, read, parse, edit, and save map file.
Version:
3.0.0
Author:
Sumit Sharma, Muhammad Adnan Asad, Pranaykumar Chauhan, Darshansinh Dilipsinh Devda, Dhruvkumar Parmar, Dhruv Patel
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • loadMap

      public Map loadMap(GameState p_gameState, String p_loadFileName)
      The 'loadmap' method handles the processing of map files.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - current state of game.
      p_loadFileName - map file name.
      Returns:
      Map object after processing map file.

    • loadFile

      public List<String> loadFile(String p_loadFileName)
      The 'loadFile' method is used to handle the loading and reading of map files.
      Parameters:
      p_loadFileName - map file name to load.
      Returns:
      List of lines from map file.

    • editMap

      public void editMap(GameState p_gameState, String p_editFilePath) throws IOException
      Method is responsible for creating a new map if map to be edited does not exists, and if it exists it parses the map file to game state object.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - GameState model class object
      p_editFilePath - consists of base filepath
      Throws:
      IOException - triggered in case the file does not exist or the file name is invalid

    • addRemoveContinents

      public Map addRemoveContinents(GameState p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeUpdated, String p_operation, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Builds an updated list of continents based on the provided operations (Add/Remove) and their associated arguments.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object
      p_mapToBeUpdated - Map Object to be Updated
      p_operation - Operation to perform on Continents
      p_argument - Arguments pertaining to the operations
      Returns:
      List of updated continents
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

    • addRemoveCountry

      public Map addRemoveCountry(GameState p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeUpdated, String p_operation, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Executes the add/remove operation on the countries within the map.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object
      p_mapToBeUpdated - The Map to be updated
      p_operation - Operation to be performed
      p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation
      Returns:
      Updated Map Object
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

    • addRemoveNeighbour

      public Map addRemoveNeighbour(GameState p_gameState, Map p_mapToBeUpdated, String p_operation, String p_argument) throws InvalidMap
      Executes the add/remove operation on Map Object.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object
      p_mapToBeUpdated - The Map to be updated
      p_operation - Add/Remove operation to be performed
      p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation
      Returns:
      map to be updated
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception

    • editFunctions

      public void editFunctions(GameState p_gameState, String p_operation, String p_argument, String p_switchParameter) throws IOException, InvalidMap, InvalidCommand
      Controls the Flow of Edit Operations: editcontinent, editcountry, editneighbor.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState Object.
      p_argument - Arguments for the pertaining command operation.
      p_operation - Add/Remove operation to be performed.
      p_switchParameter - Type of Edit Operation to be performed.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception.
      InvalidMap - invalidmap exception.
      InvalidCommand - invalid command exception

    • saveMap

      public boolean saveMap(GameState p_gameState, String p_fileName) throws InvalidMap
      Executes the updated map to .map file and stores it at required location.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - Current GameState
      p_fileName - filename to save things in
      Returns:
      true/false based on successful save operation of map to file
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - InvalidMap exception

    • resetMap

      public void resetMap(GameState p_gameState, String p_name_of_file)
      Restores the map in the Game State to its default state.
      Parameters:
      p_gameState - object of GameState class
      p_name_of_file - name of file to be loaded

    • setD_MapServiceLog

      public void setD_MapServiceLog(String p_MapServiceLog, GameState p_gameState)
      Set the log of map service methods.
      Parameters:
      p_MapServiceLog - Log Message for map service
      p_gameState - current gamestate

    • getMapFormat

      public String getMapFormat() throws IOException
      Checks which format user wants to save the map in.
      Returns:
      Map format to be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - reading exception
